channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:25 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 18:25 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 18:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 18:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 4:42 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
